product_name: Rareform Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle Blade Cover
long_description: Protect your paddle blade and show off a little style with the Rareform Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle Blade Cover. Each cover is made from upcycled vinyl for a unique look and high durability. 0.25 in. padding protects from dings, and a heavy duty corrosion-resistant zipper offers easy entry. Made from reused advertising billboard vinyl for high durability and unique styling. Please note that because this item is made of upcycled materials, each one is unique and specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Protect your paddle blade and show off a little style with the Rareform Stand Up Paddleboard Paddle Blade Cover. Each cover is made from upcycled vinyl for a unique look and high durability.
